Title: Relates to requiring the adoption of policies, procedures, and guidelines restricting the use of smartphones by students on school property
Summary: Requires the governing board or body of every local educational agency to adopt policies, procedures, and guidelines restricting the use of smartphones by students on school property; directs the department of education to produce model guidelines that governing boards and bodies of local educational agencies may use to inform their adoption of policies, procedures, and guidelines.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the adoption of policies, procedures, and guidelines restricting the use of smartphones by students on school property
